text: Club Progresista is an Argentine sports club in the Piñeyro district of Avellaneda Partido, Greater Buenos Aires. The club has been regarded for its football squad that played in Primera División during the 1920s. Other than football, sports like Basque pelota, swimming and taekwondo are also played at the club. ==References== Category:Argentine football clubs Category:Buenos Aires Province Category:1902 establishments in South America Category:1900s establishments in Argentina
title: Club Progresista
